005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.PositiveIntegerAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.StringAdapter;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.TokenAdapter;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLine;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLineAdapter;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaData;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.JsonGroupAsBehavior;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraint;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.AllowedValue;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.AllowedValues;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundAssembly;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundField;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundFlag;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.GroupAs;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaAssembly;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.ValueConstraints;
026
027import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
028import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
029
030import java.math.BigInteger;
031import java.util.LinkedList;
032import java.util.List;
033
034@SuppressWarnings({
035    "PMD.DataClass",
036    "PMD.FieldNamingConventions"
037})
038@MetaschemaAssembly(
039    formalName = "Flag Reference",
040    name = "flag-reference",
041    moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
042public class FlagReference implements IBoundObject {
043  private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
044
045  @BoundFlag(
046      formalName = "Global Flag Reference",
047      name = "ref",
048      required = true,
049      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class)
050  private String _ref;
051
052  @BoundFlag(
053      formalName = "Flag Reference Binary Name",
054      name = "index",
055      typeAdapter = PositiveIntegerAdapter.class)
056  private BigInteger _index;
057
058  @BoundFlag(
059      formalName = "Deprecated Version",
060      name = "deprecated",
061      typeAdapter = StringAdapter.class)
062  private String _deprecated;
063
064  @BoundFlag(
065      formalName = "Default Flag Value",
066      name = "default",
067      typeAdapter = StringAdapter.class)
068  private String _default;
069
070  @BoundFlag(
071      formalName = "Is Flag Required?",
072      name = "required",
073      defaultValue = "no",
074      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class,
075      valueConstraints = @ValueConstraints(allowedValues = @AllowedValues(level = IConstraint.Level.ERROR,
076          values = { @AllowedValue(value = "yes", description = "The flag is required."),
077              @AllowedValue(value = "no", description = "The flag is optional.") })))
078  private String _required;
079
080  @BoundField(
081      formalName = "Formal Name",
082      description = "A formal name for the data construct, to be presented in documentation.",
083      useName = "formal-name")
084  private String _formalName;
085
086  @BoundField(
087      formalName = "Description",
088      description = "A short description of the data construct's purpose, describing the constructs semantics.",
089      useName = "description",
090      typeAdapter = MarkupLineAdapter.class)
091  private MarkupLine _description;
092
093  @BoundAssembly(
094      formalName = "Property",
095      useName = "prop",
096      maxOccurs = -1,
097      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "props", inJson = JsonGroupAsBehavior.LIST))
098  private List<Property> _props;
099
100  @BoundField(
101      formalName = "Use Name",
102      description = "Allows the name of the definition to be overridden.",
103      useName = "use-name")
104  private UseName _useName;
105
106  @BoundField(
107      formalName = "Remarks",
108      description = "Any explanatory or helpful information to be provided about the remarks parent.",
109      useName = "remarks")
110  private Remarks _remarks;
111
112  public FlagReference() {
113    this(null);
114  }
115
116  public FlagReference(IMetaschemaData data) {
117    this.__metaschemaData = data;
118  }
119
120  @Override
121  public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
122    return __metaschemaData;
123  }
124
125  public String getRef() {
126    return _ref;
127  }
128
129  public void setRef(String value) {
130    _ref = value;
131  }
132
133  public BigInteger getIndex() {
134    return _index;
135  }
136
137  public void setIndex(BigInteger value) {
138    _index = value;
139  }
140
141  public String getDeprecated() {
142    return _deprecated;
143  }
144
145  public void setDeprecated(String value) {
146    _deprecated = value;
147  }
148
149  public String getDefault() {
150    return _default;
151  }
152
153  public void setDefault(String value) {
154    _default = value;
155  }
156
157  public String getRequired() {
158    return _required;
159  }
160
161  public void setRequired(String value) {
162    _required = value;
163  }
164
165  public String getFormalName() {
166    return _formalName;
167  }
168
169  public void setFormalName(String value) {
170    _formalName = value;
171  }
172
173  public MarkupLine getDescription() {
174    return _description;
175  }
176
177  public void setDescription(MarkupLine value) {
178    _description = value;
179  }
180
181  public List<Property> getProps() {
182    return _props;
183  }
184
185  public void setProps(List<Property> value) {
186    _props = value;
187  }
188
189  /**
190   * Add a new {@link Property} item to the underlying collection.
191   *
192   * @param item
193   *          the item to add
194   * @return {@code true}
195   */
196  public boolean addProp(Property item) {
197    Property value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
198    if (_props == null) {
199      _props = new LinkedList<>();
200    }
201    return _props.add(value);
202  }
203
204  /**
205   * Remove the first matching {@link Property} item from the underlying
206   * collection.
207   *
208   * @param item
209   *          the item to remove
210   * @return {@code true} if the item was removed or {@code false} otherwise
211   */
212  public boolean removeProp(Property item) {
213    Property value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
214    return _props != null && _props.remove(value);
215  }
216
217  public UseName getUseName() {
218    return _useName;
219  }
220
221  public void setUseName(UseName value) {
222    _useName = value;
223  }
224
225  public Remarks getRemarks() {
226    return _remarks;
227  }
228
229  public void setRemarks(Remarks value) {
230    _remarks = value;
231  }
232
233  @Override
234  public String toString() {
235    return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
236  }
237}
